Name: Rose
description:
Rose is 24 years old and is married with 1 child. She lives in a rural community in the outskirts of Honiara, the capital of the Solomon Islands.

She owns and operates a small vegetable farm where she used to grow cabbage, tomatoes, green peppers, shallot and eggplants and sells them in her community and the market to earn a living. She has been doing this for 2 years.

With the her previous loans, she was able to start up her business and help pay for her child's needs. With the opportunity given to her from SPBD staff training on how to run a business, her business grows very well and she is making a very good income.

Rose is now applying for a new loan to buy for fertilizers, labor cost and tractor hiring for her farm. She plans to use her profits to build a new home for her family.

She joined SPBD in 2015 to gain access to financial services.
